title: 2-Pack Self-Adhesive Canvas Repair Patches, Waterproof Fabric Repair Kit (11x8 Inches) for Sofas, Tents, Furniture, Car Seats, and More (Black)
features: 2-Pack Large Repair Patches: Each patch measures 11 x 8 inches, providing coverage for repairs on sofas, tents, furniture, car seats, lounge chairs, and awnings.
Self-Adhesive Design: The patches come with a strong adhesive backing that ensures easy application without the need for sewing or additional tools.
Waterproof Canvas Material: Made from durable waterproof canvas, these patches are perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, protecting against moisure wear.
Versatile Use: Ideal for repairing a variety of items such as upholstery, camping gear, automotive interiors, and more, extending the life of your belongings.
Discrete Black Color: The black color blends seamlessly with dark surfaces, offering a clean and professional finish while concealing damage.
description: Material: Fabric Compatible material: Leather, Fabric
